title: AD Reporting
description: This Automation Task can be used to create report on AD Objects such as Users, Computers etc based on predefined criteria. ex. In order to Generate report of users created in last 30 days You need to first select Users then select the category 'users created in last X days' then specify the days as 30 and select the attributes custom or select all.

startADsvc.title: Start 'ADWS' and 'NTDS' Services, if stopped and their start mode is Automatic

reportType.title: Please select the AD object type

enumNames: Computers created in last X days.
Computers deleted in last X days.
Computers that are direct members of specified groups
Computers that are direct or indirect members of specified groups
Computers that are protected from deletion
Computers that are not protected from deletion
Computers that have never logged on for X days
computerOption.title: Please select the category from the drop down

cmpSearchWithName.title: enter the name of the computer

cmpWin10.title: Windows 10
cmpWin10.description: note: if no checkbox is selected, report will fetch 'Windows 10' machines by default.

enumNames: User created in the last X days
User modified in last X days
Users that are direct members of specified group
Users that are directly and indirectly members of specified group
Users that cannot change their passwords
Users that have not logged on for X days
Users accounts that will expire in next X days
Users with passwords that never expire
userOption.title: Please select the category from the drop down

userPwdChNxtLgn1.title: Must change password at next logon

userPwdChNxtLgn.title: Must change password at next logon

userSearchWithEmployeeID.title: enter the employee ID of user.

userSearchwithLogonScriptName.title: Enter the Name of the script

enumNames: Group created in last X days
Groups deleted in last X days
Groups modified in last X days
Groups that are direct members of specified group
Groups that are not protected from deletion
Groups that are protected from deletion
Groups that do not contains specified member  (window to enter the member name which needs to be searched)
Groups with specified member (window to enter the member name which needs to be searched)
groupOption.title: Please select the category from the drop down

groupSearchForMemberExclude.title: enter the name of the member

groupSearchForMember.title: enter the name of the member

enumNames: GPO with specified Unique ID (window to enter the Unique ID which needs to be searched)
gpoOption.title: Please select the category from the drop down
